abstract: Bach’s partitas and sonatas for unaccompanied violin are held in reverence by many musicians, including Jennifer Koh, who will perform them at the American Academy of Arts and Letters.

lead_paragraph: Bach’s partitas and sonatas for unaccompanied violin are held in reverence by many musicians, including Jennifer Koh, who will play them at the American Academy of Arts and Letters.

headline.main: When Bach Laid Bare His Own Soul
